history.action: üîç T+24H DAY 1 QUALITY METRICS (C602) ‚Äî Fourth QA cycle post-npm-live. T+~24h quality snapshot capturing Day 1 baseline. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Day 1 quality snapshot at T+24h provides clean baseline for measuring post-announcement quality deltas. Lesson: L292 ‚Äî T+24h quality snapshots capture pre-announcement baseline; compare against post-announcement metrics to measure announcement impact on user issues (should be minimal if quality gates held).

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è HEAT-AWARE RETRIEVAL IMPLEMENTATION (C603) ‚Äî Fourth Engineering cycle since npm live. T+~24h. **First code PR since launch** (per L288 execution velocity). Lesson: L293 ‚Äî Bridge utilities (like heat-retrieval.ts) that compose existing modules are effective for Sprint 2 integration; they avoid breaking changes while adding new capability.

history.action: üé® TERMINAL MODE UX SPEC ‚Äî Created comprehensive UX specification for Terminal Mode (#125) per L285. Defines visual separation patterns (zone prefixes, color modes, streaming output, error states). Ready for Sprint 2 Engineering implementation.
